game.name: Pack and Ship: Warehouse Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build your logistics empire from the ground up. Choose the most profitable contracts, optimize your warehouse layout for maximum efficiency, and upgrade your equipment. Balance risk and reward as you adapt your strategy to a shifting market. Every lift, every pallet, and every decision counts.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your logistics empire from the ground up. Choose the most profitable contracts, optimize your warehouse layout for maximum efficiency, and upgrade your equipment. Balance risk and reward as you adapt your strategy to a shifting market. Every lift, every pallet, and every decision counts.
